items.content_html: A lightweight toolkit to extract, download, and convert HLS streams to MP4 files for offline viewing. Features browser-based TS segment extraction and FFmpeg-powered conversion, handling CORS restrictions and blob URLs with ease. Educational purposes only.
items.title: JulienBardin/HLS-Downloader-Convert-HTTP-Live-Streams-Blob-to-MP4: A lightweight toolkit to extract, download, and convert HLS streams to MP4 files for offline viewing. Features browser-based TS segment extraction and FFmpeg-powered conversion, handling CORS restrictions and blob URLs with ease. Educational purposes only.
